common.privacyFirst: Runs locally in your browser. No tracking. No accounts.

home.title: FE Toolbox
home.description: Frontend & UI tools for everyday interface work. No backend. No tracking. Everything runs locally in your browser.

cssGradientGenerator.title: CSS Gradient Generator - FE Toolbox
cssGradientGenerator.description: Generate CSS gradients with multiple stops, types, and output formats. Get production-ready CSS code instantly. All processing happens locally in your browser.
cssGradientGenerator.heading: CSS Gradient Generator
cssGradientGenerator.subtitle: Build linear, radial, and conic gradients visually. Copy clean CSS instantly.
cssGradientGenerator.whatIsDescription: CSS Gradient Generator is a frontend utility for creating CSS gradients without guessing values. It lets you build linear / radial / conic gradients, adjust stops and angles, and copy production-ready CSS in one click.
cssGradientGenerator.parameters2: Angle / Rotation — For linear and conic
cssGradientGenerator.parameters4: Color Stops — Add, remove, reorder, and fine-tune
cssGradientGenerator.commonMistakes1: Visual control instead of manual tweaking
cssGradientGenerator.notes4: Copy CSS → paste into your project
cssGradientGenerator.privacyText: Runs locally in your browser. No tracking. No accounts.

shadowGlassGenerator.title: Shadow & Glass Generator - FE Toolbox
shadowGlassGenerator.description: Design shadows and glassmorphism panels. Generate CSS for box-shadow, drop-shadow, and backdrop-filter effects. All processing happens locally in your browser.
shadowGlassGenerator.heading: Shadow & Glass Generator
shadowGlassGenerator.subtitle: Generate modern box-shadows and glassmorphism styles with copy-ready CSS.
shadowGlassGenerator.enterCssCode: Enter CSS code (only the value after
shadowGlassGenerator.whatIsDescription: Shadow & Glass Generator helps you craft depth and blur for UI components. It generates consistent box-shadow, backdrop-filter, and related CSS so you can build a clean "glass" look or practical elevation styles without trial-and-error.
shadowGlassGenerator.parameters6: Layers — Single vs multi-layer shadow (if enabled)
shadowGlassGenerator.parameters11: Noise / Grain (optional, if you add it)
shadowGlassGenerator.whenToUse4: Consistent UI shadows across a design system
shadowGlassGenerator.commonMistakes1: Faster than eyeballing shadows in DevTools
shadowGlassGenerator.privacyText: All generation is local. No uploads, no analytics required.

clampTypography.title: Clamp / Fluid Typography Generator - FE Toolbox
clampTypography.description: Generate fluid typography and spacing using CSS clamp(). Preview scales and copy production-ready CSS.
clampTypography.heading: Clamp / Fluid Typography Generator
clampTypography.subtitle: Generate responsive font sizes with CSS clamp() — no manual math.
clampTypography.scaleNote: All sizes are generated from Body + ratio.
clampTypography.whatIs: What is Clamp / Fluid Typography Generator?
clampTypography.whatIsDescription: Clamp / Fluid Typography Generator produces fluid typography values using CSS clamp() so text scales smoothly across screen sizes. It helps you generate a consistent type scale (Body, Small, H1–H6) and copy readable CSS for production.
clampTypography.parameters1: Viewport Range — Min / Max viewport width
clampTypography.parameters4: Include Small — Optional small text token
clampTypography.whenToUse4: Consistent headings hierarchy for product UIs
clampTypography.commonMistakes2: Produces a full scale, not one-off values
clampTypography.notes2: Choose base size and scale ratio
clampTypography.privacyText: Runs locally in your browser. No tracking. No accounts.

privacy.title: Privacy - FE Toolbox
privacy.description: Privacy policy for FE Toolbox. We don't collect, store, or transmit any data.
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: FE Toolbox is a privacy-first web application. We do not collect, store, or transmit any user data to external servers.
privacy.introLocal: All processing happens locally in your browser.
privacy.noDataCollectionText: FE Toolbox does not collect, store, log, or transmit any personal or technical data. All inputs remain on your device and are never sent anywhere.
privacy.noAnalyticsText: We do not use analytics tools, tracking pixels, third-party scripts, or fingerprinting technologies. No tracking cookies are set. Only essential, non-identifying functionality may use browser storage when required.
privacy.noBackendText: FE Toolbox is a static, client-side application. There is no backend server processing your requests. All tool logic runs entirely in JavaScript within your browser.
privacy.openSourceText: The source code is publicly available and can be reviewed. You can independently verify all privacy-related claims by inspecting the code.
privacy.yourDataText: Your data never leaves your device. We don't see it, store it, log it, or sell it.
